    Methods in ca.jolt.security.config that return CorsConfiguration
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CorsConfiguration
    CorsConfiguration.allowedCredentials(boolean allow)
    Sets whether credentials are allowed in CORS requests.
    CorsConfiguration
    CorsConfiguration.allowedHeaders(String... headers)
    Sets the allowed HTTP headers for CORS requests.
    CorsConfiguration
    CorsConfiguration.allowedMethods(String... methods)
    Sets the allowed HTTP methods for CORS requests.
    CorsConfiguration
    CorsConfiguration.allowedOrigins(String... origins)
    Sets the allowed origins for CORS requests.
    CorsConfiguration
    CorsConfiguration.maxAge(long seconds)
    Sets the maximum age (in seconds) of the cache duration for preflight responses.
    CorsConfiguration
    SecurityConfiguration.withCORS()
    Provides access to the CORS configuration for fluent configuration.
